title: Introducing the Ninja Coffee Bar® Single Serve System
description: The Ninja Coffee Bar Single Serve System offers pod-free single serve in five brew types with four different size options, ranging from a single cup to our 22 oz. XL Multi-Serve.

asset.title: Introducing the Ninja Coffee Bar® Single Serve System
asset.description:
The Ninja Coffee Bar Single Serve System offers pod-free single serve in five brew types with four different size options, ranging from a single cup to our 22 oz. XL Multi-Serve. 

Learn more about the Ninja Coffee Bar Single Serve System at NinjaCoffeeBar.com
asset.author: Ninja Coffee Bar

transcripts: The ninja coffee bar single-serve system comes complete with a variety of brew types sizes and features that you can't get anywhere else. Pod free single-serve enables you to use your favorite coffee grounds for unlimited variety when brewing a single cup up to the new XL multi served travel-size the ninja coffee bar system allows you to further customize your coffee with ninjas advanced thermal flavor extraction technology by creating variable levels of richness from the same grounds including the ninja exclusive cafe forte which amplifies the natural subtle flavors for sensationally different coffee experience top off your favorite beverage by using the ninja coffee bars integrated frothier to easily frost both hot and cold milk.
